InstructionData.Title: Mars Waste Control
InstructionData.Description: Control the temperture of waste gases by useing raidators, dump it into filteration when nessary.â€‹
InstructionData.Author: Renrek
InstructionData.Instructions:
define MINPRESSURE 5000 define MAXPRESSURE 10000 define TOKELVIN 273.15
alias dial d0 alias display d1 alias tank d2 alias outsideSensor d3 alias radiatorValve d4 alias dumpValve d5
alias targetTemp r0 alias outsideTemp r1 alias tankTemp r2 alias tankPressure r3 alias tempStatus r4 alias pressureStatus r5 alias radiatorStatus r6 alias dumpStatus r7
main: jal checkSensors bgtal tankTemp targetTemp lowerTemperature bltal tankTemp targetTemp raiseTemperature s radiatorValve On radiatorStatus seq dumpStatus tankTemp targetTemp s dumpValve On dumpStatus j main
checkSensors: l targetTemp dial Setting s display Setting targetTemp add targetTemp targetTemp TOKELVIN l tankTemp tank Temperature l outsideTemp outsideSensor Temperature j ra
lowerTemperature: slt radiatorStatus outsideTemp tankTemp j ra
raiseTemperature: sgt radiatorStatus outsideTemp tankTemp j ra
